mapper.sql: OTL_DTC_ID, ANA_STR_DTM, OTL_SNO, ANL_VAR_ID, COL_CNT, OTL_YN, OTL_RPL, OTL_RPL_VAL, COL_NM1, COL_NM2, COL_NM3, COL_NM4, COL_NM5, COL_NM6, COL_NM7, COL_NM8, COL_NM9, COL_NM10, COL_NM11, COL_NM12, COL_NM13, COL_NM14, COL_NM15, COL_NM16, COL_NM17, COL_NM18, COL_NM19, COL_NM20, COL_NM21, COL_NM22, COL_NM23, COL_NM24, COL_NM25, COL_NM26, COL_NM27, COL_NM28, COL_NM29, COL_NM30, COL_NM31, COL_NM32, COL_NM33, COL_NM34, COL_NM35, COL_NM36, COL_NM37, COL_NM38, COL_NM39, COL_NM40, COL_NM41, COL_NM42, COL_NM43, COL_NM44, COL_NM45, COL_NM46, COL_NM47, COL_NM48, COL_NM49, COL_NM50, COL_NM51, COL_NM52, COL_NM53, COL_NM54, COL_NM55, COL_NM56, COL_NM57, COL_NM58, COL_NM59, COL_NM60, COL_NM61, COL_NM62, COL_NM63, COL_NM64, COL_NM65, COL_NM66, COL_NM67, COL_NM68, COL_NM69, COL_NM70, COL_NM71, COL_NM72, COL_NM73, COL_NM74, COL_NM75, COL_NM76, COL_NM77, COL_NM78, COL_NM79, COL_NM80, COL_NM81, COL_NM82, COL_NM83, COL_NM84, COL_NM85, COL_NM86, COL_NM87, COL_NM88, COL_NM89, COL_NM90, COL_NM91, COL_NM92, COL_NM93, COL_NM94, COL_NM95, COL_NM96, COL_NM97, COL_NM98, COL_NM99, COL_NM100
mapper.select:
-- 이상값 탐지 결과 데이터 조회...(단변량) SELECT A.OTL_DTC_ID, A.ANA_STR_DTM, A.OTL_SNO, A.ANL_VAR_ID , B.DB_COL_NM AS ANL_VAR_NM , A.COL_CNT , A.COL_NM1
FROM WAD_OTL_DATA A JOIN WAD_ANA_VAR B ON A.ANL_VAR_ID = B.ANL_VAR_ID WHERE A.OTL_DTC_ID = #{otlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.OTL_SNO != 0 ORDER BY A.ANL_VAR_ID, A.OTL_SNO

-- 이상값 탐지 결과 데이터 조회...(단변량) SELECT A.OTL_DTC_ID, A.ANA_STR_DTM, A.OTL_SNO, A.ANL_VAR_ID , B.DB_COL_NM AS ANL_VAR_NM , A.COL_CNT , A.COL_NM1 , A.OTL_YN , A.OTL_RPL FROM WAD_OTL_DATA A JOIN WAD_ANA_VAR B ON A.ANL_VAR_ID = B.ANL_VAR_ID WHERE A.OTL_DTC_ID = #{dtcvo.otlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ANL_VAR_ID = #{dtcvo.anlVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = DATE_FORMAT(#{pattvo.objDate}, '%Y%m%d%T') AND A.OTL_SNO != 0 ORDER BY A.ANL_VAR_ID, A.OTL_SNO

-- 컬럼정보 조회... SELECT A.* , C.DBC_COL_KOR_NM AS COL_KOR_NM FROM WAD_OTL_DATA A LEFT JOIN WAD_ANA_VAR B ON A.ANL_VAR_ID = B.ANL_VAR_ID LEFT JOIN WAT_DBC_COL C ON B.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND B.DB_COL_NM = C.DBC_COL_NM AND B.DB_TBL_NM = C.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE A.OTL_DTC_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = DATE_FORMAT(#{objDate}, '%Y%m%d%T') AND A.OTL_SNO = 0

-- 이상값 조회... SELECT OTL_DTC_ID, ANA_STR_DTM, OTL_SNO, ANL_VAR_ID, COL_CNT, OTL_YN, OTL_RPL ${colNm} FROM WAD_OTL_DATA WHERE OTL_DTC_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ANA_STR_DTM = DATE_FORMAT(#{objDate}, '%Y%m%d%T') -- AND A.OTL_SNO = 0
-- 이상값 탐지 결과 데이터 조회...다변량 SELECT A.* FROM WAD_OTL_DATA A WHERE A.OTL_DTC_ID = #{otlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.ANL_VAR_ID, A.OTL_SNO

-- 컬럼정보 조회... SELECT A.ANL_VAR_ID , A.OTL_DTC_ID , A.ANA_STR_DTM
FROM WAD_OTL_RESULT A WHERE A.OTL_DTC_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = DATE_FORMAT(#{objDate}, '%Y%m%d%T')
